rows.label: qst002201_msg0002
rows.name:
You don't look like you live
in Acedia... Thank goodness.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0004
rows.name:
My mother was orphaned in the war,
and I grew up here in Acedia.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0005
rows.name:
So I'm Gulan, but I've
never been to Gula...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0006
rows.name:
Recently, something has been
bothering me... I feel like someone
is watching me all the time.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0007
rows.name:
I was recently accepted into
the Choir, and I think it
started around then...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0009
rows.name:
If it's not too much trouble, could
you help me find out who it is?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0011
rows.name:
Um, could you ask around with
the people living in Acedia?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0012
rows.name:
I'd like you to casually ask
about me and investigate.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0013
rows.name:
I think it must be someone
who lives in this city.
Otherwise, why would they...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll wait here, so please,
I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0101
rows.name:
Could you please ask the people
in this city for information?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0102
rows.name:
I hope it's just my imagination
that someone is watching me...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0103
rows.name:
Or could it have something
to do with me being accepted
into the Choir...?
